testcase.name: User searches for a valid product
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User searches for a valid product Given User opens the Application ... passed in 0.000s When User enters valid product "HP" into Search box field ... passed in 0.001s And User clicks on Search button ... passed in 0.000s Then User should get valid product displayed in search results ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User searches for an invalid product
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User searches for an invalid product Given User opens the Application ... passed in 0.001s When User enters invalid product "Honda" into Search box field ... passed in 0.001s And User clicks on Search button ... passed in 0.000s Then User should get a message about no product matching ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User searches without any product
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User searches without any product Given User opens the Application ... passed in 0.001s When User dont enter any product name into Search box field ... passed in 0.001s And User clicks on Search button ... passed in 0.000s Then User should get a message about no product matching ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
